short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get beautiful color palette in your new tab, and select the right color for you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you like colors? ever wanted to know the code for the color you chose?
Color Picker allows you to get the color code instantly, placed on your homepage for easy access!

By clicking "Add to Chrome" I accept and agree to install the Color Picker Chrome extension and hereby agree to set the Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy policy and Terms of Use. The search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Privacy Policy: https://whatcolorext.com/privacy.html
Terms of Use: https://whatcolorext.com/terms.html

You may uninstall the extension at any time
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser
2) Go to "Settings"
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions"
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall
